slide.title: Contravariant Argument Types
slide.example:
<?php
class 🐖 {}
class 🐗 extends 🐖 {}

class Asterix
{
	public function hunt(🐗 $animal) {}
}

class Gauls extends Asterix
{
	public function hunt(🐖 $animal) {}
}
?>
slide.blurb:
Arguments types are *contra-variant*:
~they can accept a more broad type~
